article_text:
Donald Trump, the presumptive Republican presidential nominee, is considering his options for a vice president. Among them are Sen. Jeff Sessions, R-Alabama, former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley and New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie. Which of these possibilities do you prefer?

You voted:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , obamacare, barack obama, medicare, medicaid, social security, affordable care act
article_metadata.author: the editorial board of The Anniston Star

og.description: At some point, ideological opponents of the United States’ three greatest entitlements of the 20th century — Social Security, Medicaid and Medicare — changed tactics.
og.title: Loving Obamacare to death

article_metadata.keywords: , obamacare, barack obama, medicare, medicaid, social security, affordable care act

article_summary:
Among them are Sen. Jeff Sessions, R-Alabama, former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, South Carolina Gov.
Donald Trump, the presumptive Republican presidential nominee, is considering his options for a vice president.
Nikki Haley and New Jersey Gov.
Which of these possibilities do you prefer?
Chris Christie.
